html:
1.1.23  1:11 pm   do you have a new years resolution

      no, but i have resolutions most other times

1.1.23  10:57 am   what's your favorite prime number?

      19

1.1.23  10:19 am   What's your opinion on new year's resolutions

      fake

1.1.23  9:28 am   What did you do for NYE?

      i watched the unbearable talent of nick cage

1.1.23  9:12 am   in "at the airport terminal" one of your lines was "... and im on the next flight, it's going around the world", and that was 3 years ago. 6 months ago, you released "the ground plane", and in that song one of your lines was "when the plane gets too high, i dont like it. bring me down plane." with this information, i ask:
why do you hate flight now?

      i like flight, but i was actually going to ask why you hate it

1.1.23  7:52 am   could you give us a look into your never-ending list of rare and obscure paul mccartney recommendations? thanks

      sure. try 'love mix'

1.1.23  6:48 am   would you rather listen to a song that sounds like it was made on the stage or in a studio?

      it depends which way i've recently heard less of

1.1.23  5:00 am   does the day go on

      that sounds like some sort of ponzi scheme

1.1.23  4:20 am   A long time ago, you used to refuse to answer any questions about your favorites unless there was an entertaining response for them, but now there are proper answers to these questions (like  your fav chord, fav song, fav tv series). What changed?

      which questions you were in the mood to notice

1.1.23  1:06 am   Happy new year mr wurtz,are you excited for the fabulous month of January?

      yes i am

1.1.23  12:13 am   What's your new year resolution for 2023

      to start adding "for 2024" at the end of all my video titles next december





PREVIOUS QUESTIONS

12.31.22  11:50 pm   do you think we will we ever run out of melodies? 

      no

12.31.22  11:24 pm   do you ever miss the dinosaurs?

      no

12.31.22  8:24 pm   do you think a very important event will happen in 2023

like more important than the invention of the wheel

      it's possible

12.31.22  8:22 pm   should i be thinking about my location in terms of when not where

      how about both

12.31.22  6:11 pm   how make burrito

      wrap a burrito inside a pile of other burritos

12.31.22  4:15 pm   What's up with anarchism!

      must be the opposite of archism

12.31.22  3:01 pm   should I put all my acorns in the same bag, or give each their own individual bag?

      how about putting them back in the tree

12.31.22  3:00 pm   would you turn up your nose at a scented candle that was scented with any scent other than chocolate chip cookie

      no

12.31.22  12:42 pm   Do you like people? Just in general

      yes

12.31.22  12:41 pm   Happy new year, Bill. What's your new year's resolution?

      any goal i make that's not on new years. because new years resolutions are famous for being fake things that people only think about in the new year season. so to counteract this, i use the phrase 'new years resolution' to refer to any goal i have at any time EXCEPT for the new years season, because during the new years season it might get misconstrewed for one of the fake ones

12.31.22  12:39 pm   on this question: https://billwurtz.com/questions/q.php?date=201909121730 someone asked when will your next video be out, you answered "what the heck is a video" have you learned what a video is since then?

      no, but that never stopped anything

12.31.22  12:19 pm   musical tunes make people happy do?

      sure

12.31.22  12:15 pm   is earth a simulation

      yes, it's a simulation of mars

12.31.22  11:25 am   how do you think of ideas for videos

      i keep a dream journal, in reverse. during my dreams i write down what happend when i was awake

12.31.22  10:54 am   so here's what I've got so far: it's equally hugely important and nonimportant to be completely serious and 100% silly both all the time, and only at just the right time. do you think this is an accurate estimate so far?

      it seems like it's all extremes to both sides. i like the counterbalance, but there's definitely gonna be a need for some of the middle shades

12.31.22  9:23 am   how do i be a genius like u

      instead of putting your ducks in a row, put them vertically, in a stack

12.31.22  9:15 am   Is all sound just a waveform?

     no, the waveform is just the delivery system. think of it in terms of a bag of nails: ..... the waveform is the bag, and the music is the nails

     So all music is just a series of numbers representing a wave? It sounds too simple to be true

      no. think of it another way: if i tell you something, the thing i'm telling you is not the words and letters. it's the thing i've told you. it's the thing you know now and can take with you

12.31.22  6:08 am   what do you usually do when you're sad?

      try to tell the story of how i got sad. stories are happy. especially sad stories

12.31.22  2:19 am   what is the word for the end of the weekend

      it's 2 words. sunday night

12.31.22  1:27 am   is santa clause real

      on par with mickey mouse

12.30.22  11:57 pm   How can I tell I'm writing chords that "match" a melody?

     it's the same way you wear clothes that match....... if you know how to do that

     Is there specific theory to see how they fit, is it based off feeling or is it a combination?

     the only one who truly knows is you. it's also like food tasting. there is no other person in the world who knows how the food in your mouth tastes. unless you somehow invite them in, but that's another story

      I'm also wondering how big instrumentation affects the sound of something; 

     again, only you know how it sounds to you

     if I use a chord that I think I might like, will I have to fully write the instrumentation to tell if it truly sounds right?

     you can get a pretty good idea of how things are gonna work, just by playing/writing on one instrument. but there's always surprises in the production. it's just like writing a movie, and then you get to the actual location for filming and sometimes the room is a slightly different shape than you were expecting

12.30.22  11:23 pm   what is the optimal reality to bullshit ratio for a good sci-fi story and world

      all or nothing

12.30.22  10:28 pm   Give me your best tips to have a good Tuesday. Perhaps what you always do.

      see if you can beat nostalgia by remembering that all the most nostalgic times in the past were exactly as new then as the current day is now

12.30.22  9:37 pm   what is the last thing you want to do when 2022 ends?

      it doesn't particularly matter, but it does matter more generally the types of things i will be doing in the upcoming weeks and months

12.30.22  9:19 pm   I've got a life waiting for me... it's so close I jist have to reach out and grab it... but I'm not going to move out of my chair, am I? 

      you can if you want

12.30.22  9:03 pm   do you actually plan everything about a song or do you just wing it?

      i plan how the song goes. which is not necessarily the exact way it sounds physically, but rather how it goes. how you remember it in your head. that part is all planned in the writing process

12.30.22  8:34 pm   why do the kids in my basement always scream

      they might be happy

12.30.22  8:17 pm   Is the earth flat?

      no but maybe you could flatten it

12.30.22  7:45 pm   what's your favourite song

      the power of love, but only if it's accompanied by marty mcfly being late for school on a skateboard. without that, the song doesn't work, unless i am somehow able to imagine marty mcfly being late for school on a skateboard

12.30.22  7:45 pm   what's your favourite tv series

      sharay reed throwing the iphone on his music stand in church and uploading it

12.30.22  7:17 pm   is the part in soft clothing where the person is walking the cat and then it walks them back an allegory to the golden rule, "treat others the way you want to be treated"

      you can look at it that way. role reversal and flipping things is one of my go-to ingredients. that technique suits me, in general

12.30.22  6:55 pm   what's your favourite movie

      nick fuckiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaah cage

12.30.22  4:09 pm   what is your favorite pizza topping

      white rice

12.30.22  3:22 pm   Was writing im scared as catharthic as it seems from the outside?

      i'm not sure. the only way to evaluate that is if we both share some numbers

12.30.22  3:13 pm   What's up with communism?

      living proof that things can be both funny and serious

12.30.22  2:37 pm   when will the next vid come out?

      about january 13

12.30.22  1:54 pm   Why do you not play in measurements and without timing in your piano playing?

      i'm not really sure what you're talking about, but i have many types of piano playing with and without measurements, and with and without timing, at different parts of my website. although to get technical about it, i suppose none of it is done with an actual piano, but all of it is done with what's known as a 'piano keyboard' which is sometimes just called a 'piano' for short. even better, in some cases i'm using a piano sound on the piano keyboard, which is even more likely to be referred to as a piano. that being said, i have plenty of that exact stuff, with measurements and without, and with timing and without but i will confess that the majority of it does indeed have measurements and timing

12.30.22  12:44 pm   what's a joke you've heard so many times that it became unfunny, but then became funny again

      the passage of time

12.30.22  12:14 pm   favourite Michael Bublé song/moment

      first few lines of just havent met you yet. "i'm not surprised, not everything lasts, .... etc etc i've stopped keeping track."
